CustomField.description: wd field Displays funnel date for current stage in the funnel. Used for report filters.
CustomField.formula:
IF ( OR( ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - No Action Required" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Merged" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Disqualified" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Nurture/Marketing" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Already Engaged" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Deleted" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Lost" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Won" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Unmapped" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Legacy" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Not a Response")),NULL ,
IF( Neg__c = TRUE, FCR_SQR_Date__c, IF( VOC__c = TRUE, FCR_SQR_Date__c, IF( Prop__c = TRUE, FCR_SQR_Date__c, IF( Demo__c = TRUE, FCR_SQR_Date__c,
IF( FCR_SQR__c = TRUE, FCR_SQR_Date__c, IF( FCRM_FCR_SAL__c = TRUE, SAL_Date__c, IF( FCR_SAR__c = TRUE, FCR_SAR_Date__c , IF( FCR_QR__c = TRUE, FCR_QR_Date__c , IF( FCR_Inquiry_Target__c = TRUE, FCR_Inquiry_Target_Date__c , NULL ) )))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays funnel date for current stage in the funnel. Used for report filters.
CustomField.label: Current Stage In Funnel Date
